form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/15/2023 PORTANT NOTE: THE APPLICATION FEE IS NOW $125.00 FORM APPROVED O.M.B. No. 1405-0015 OPTIONAL FORM 230 (English) (Rev. 6-82) DEPT. OF STATE APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION 50230-105 INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in E by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. All questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on separate sheets, in dupli- cate, using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa is $25.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be grounds for your prosecution and/or deportation. 1. Family name First name Middle name PATEL NAGARBHAI BHAGABHAI 2. Other names used or by which known (If married woman, give maiden name) NONG 3. Full name in native alphabet (If Roman letters not used) UICY 0112129165 4. Date of birth 5. Age 6. Place of birth (Day) (Month) (Year) (City or town) (Province) (Country) 5 OCT 191.3 78 ZERVAVRA GUJARAT INDIA 7. Nationality 8. Sex 9. Marital status BRITISH Male Female Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated CITIZEN Including my present marriage, I have been married two times. 10. Occupation RETIRED 11. Present address 19- STANLEY ROAD WELLINGBOROUGH MRTHANTS NN8 10y 12. Name, address, date and place of birth of wife/husband (Give maiden name of wife) PATEL CHITLIBENSITABEN - 19-STANLEY ROAD- WELLINGBRROUGH NURTHAND D.O.B. 6-SEPT-1936- DANDESWAR INDIA. Nory 10y Date and place of marriage 1958 ZERVAVRA. INDIA 13. Names, addresses, dates and places of birth of all children PATEL- NATHUBHAI. LEFTUK BORN ZERVAVRA (INDIA) 1945 FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) 14. Person(s) named in 12 and 13 who will accompany or follow 15. Final address in the United States me to the United States PATEL CHITLIBEN SITABEN 232312 ANCHOR AVENUE CARSON CA 90745 16. Person you intend to join (Give name, address, and relationship, 17. Name and address of sponsoring person or organization (If different from 16) FOIA (b)(6) some as in 16 18. Personal description 19. Marks of identification (a) Color of hair (c) Height BLACK 5 feet 7 inches NONE (b) Color of eyes (d) Complexion 20. Purpose in going to the United States BLACK BROWN PERMANENT SETTLEMENT 21. Length of intended stay (If permanently, so state) 22. Intended port of entry 23. Do you have a ticket to final destination? PERMANENT LAX NO THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA NSN 7540-00-149-0919 Previous edition not usable
